sense.def:
A member of a group
je eden izmed ljudi, živali ali stvari, ki sodijo v določeno skupino.

seg.quote: Babies usually have milder colds than older members of the family.
The weaver bird is a member of the sparrow family.

sense.def:
A member of an organization
je človek, ki se je pridružil neki organizaciji.

Države ali dežele, ki se pridružijo mednarodni organizaciji, se imenujejo
the member states or countries
.

seg.quote: All the member countries are under pressure to conform.

sense.def:
A member
pomeni isto kot
a Member of Parliament
.

seg.quote: ...John Parker, the Labour member for Dagenham.
